name: 新流星搜劍錄
description:
" Master of Meteor Blades " is a cold weapon battle game built by Titans studio, is the "meteor butterfly sword. Net" authentic sequel, the game is used of the original Chinese martial arts cold weapon rub tactics play , this game at the E3 exhibition, won the "best game creative play" award. In the game, players can learn different tactics of attacking, defense and walking by means of different weapon selection and tactics through different weapons so that players can freely combine and create themselves. Martial arts style and then create their own martial disciples. You can also match the record through a variety of modes of battle, such as against, deathmatch, assassination, headhunting, get the titles and achievements of the worlds, vie for the weapons of the worlds you can use in the first master, experience more in a real world of kungfu.
More freedom of war experience, more imaginative battle moves, richer and more interesting team mode, breaking the routine martial arts game occupation, level, skill, sworn marriage teacher system shackles, allowing players to experience more free and more real world of kungfu, Feel the unique charm of Chinese martial arts.Story backgroundAt the time of the Ming dynasty, the reign of Ming Dynasty was called the "Paradise of the Era". Under the flourishing age, the power of the court was too powerful, undermined the balance between the good and evil of the martial arts for hundreds of years, the chivalrous spirit was gradually disappearing, the wicked either wished to win the favor of the court or both. The ancestral majesty was only used to open up the territory and to neglect the internal turmoil that gradually formed. The "Seven Knights" that suddenly appeared in the arena seemed to have seven members who had singled out seven fame in martial arts alone Sowing martial arts organizations, and stay in place where the sword poem: "I flow sword on the ground, nobody is no longer Knights in the world" This astonishingly powerful force and no one in the eyes, in the deadliest world set off a wave of growth, it is fear, admiration, efficiency, disdain, anger, hatred ... ... the waves of various emotions, the waves, more aroused Warriors good and strong victory of the water! Embrace their own reasons, the search for the people in the mobilization but still fruitless, leaving only the world's swords and legends ridiculed. In the world, that night's legend, is known as "seven Feng Lu."
Nowadays, the great age has been opened. As a benefactor in the troubled times, what choice would you make?Game Features:● The game offers a wide variety of weapons and more than 10 different cold weapons players, such as swords, sticks, daggers, park knife, boxing shield, etc., and can be used with different types of off-hand weapon, such as hidden weapon, bow and arrow, and forbearance with Guqin, hammer, handguns, etc., each weapon has its own characteristics and allelopathy, but also have their own different, many of the changes moves, players can choose and create their own fighting style according to your preference.

● Rich game mode
Players can choose their favorite game modes, such as Deathmatch, Stalker, General, Siege, Capture Flag, Heroes, etc., you can also freely explore in the martial arts world to meet the needs of different players.

● Very oriental aesthetics martial arts world
The picturesque town, the buzzing tavern, the hidden murderous inn, these scenes will be the perfect performance in the game, with Oriental aesthetic rendering for the player to create a true martial arts world.

● Punch to meat sense of combat
The game in the battle to show the fist to the flesh, knife to the bones of the sense of combat, striving to give the player the same action with a single masterpiece fighting game masterpiece.

● Combat-type dodge
In martial arts world, dodge is essential. Players can fly in the game to go wall, wall can be arrested at a height, you can send some special moves through the dodge. In the complex terrain, dodge gives the battle more fun and "uncertainty."
